name: Coming Soon Page Maintenance Mode Under Construction Page
author: EasyToolbox

sections.description:
Using this “Coming Soon Page Maintenance Mode Under Construction Page” plugin user can easily take their website to under construction state.

Options

  • Is active : Activate and deactive the settings
  • Company name : Name of your company.
  • Message : Message you want to show.
  • Comeback timer : When your site will be live.

Arbitrary section

A brief Markdown Example
sections.installation:
1. Upload et-coming-soon-page-maintenance-mode-under-construction-page folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Installation process completed.
  4. Now Go to Easy SocialShare menu, here you can set the status ON / OFF and can select your favorite social share networks.

short_description: Elegant looking coming soon page, Maintenance Mode & Under construction page. Put your site under maintenance in minutes.
